complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks for setting up Firestore, Functions, Hosting, and Cloud Messaging, including security rules and environment configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Setting up a Firebase project involves multiple services and requires careful configuration of security rules and environment variables. Each service (Firestore, Functions, Hosting, Cloud Messaging) has its own setup and testing requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into subtasks for setting up Create React App, configuring React Router, and creating basic components.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Using Create React App simplifies the initial setup, but adding routing and creating multiple components adds moderate complexity. Testing is straightforward but requires ensuring all routes and components function correctly.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for setting up API integration, handling responses, and securing API keys.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating an external API like OpenAI involves handling authentication, managing API calls, and securely storing API keys. Testing requires mocking API responses and ensuring correct data handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for implementing the function, integrating with OpenAI, and updating Firestore.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex integration with OpenAI and Firestore, requiring robust error handling and testing with various transcript data to ensure accurate processing and storage.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for developing the function, scheduling questions, and storing in Firestore.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Generating questions based on AI analysis involves complex logic and scheduling, requiring thorough testing to ensure questions are generated and stored correctly.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for developing UI components, integrating with Firebase, and testing with mock data.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Developing a user interface with multiple components and Firebase integration involves moderate complexity, with a focus on ensuring smooth data flow and user interaction.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for implementing evaluation logic, integrating AI, and updating gamification data.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex logic for evaluating answers and updating gamification data, requiring integration with AI and thorough testing to ensure accuracy and reliability.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for building chat components, integrating with OpenAI, and storing conversation history.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a chat interface with AI integration involves complex UI development and API handling, requiring extensive testing to ensure context-aware responses and data storage.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for developing UI components and integrating with Firestore for real-time updates.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Developing a dashboard involves creating visual components and ensuring real-time data updates, which is moderately complex but manageable with proper testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for developing gamification logic, integrating with Firebase, and testing updates.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing a gamification system involves complex logic and integration with Firebase, requiring thorough testing to ensure accurate tracking and updates.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for developing detection logic, sending notifications, and testing scenarios.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves developing logic to detect at-risk students and sending notifications, requiring integration with Firebase Cloud Messaging and testing with various scenarios.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for configuring FCM, implementing notification functions, and testing on devices.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating Firebase Cloud Messaging involves configuring notifications and handling messages across different devices and browsers, requiring comprehensive testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for building UI components and integrating with Firestore for updates.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Developing a multi-subject progress view involves creating UI components and ensuring real-time data updates, which is moderately complex but straightforward with proper integration.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for developing suggestion logic, sending notifications, and testing with goal completions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Developing cross-sell suggestions involves complex logic to determine relevant subjects and sending notifications, requiring thorough testing to ensure accuracy and relevance.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for building the application, deploying to Firebase, and performing end-to-end testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Deploying the application involves building and deploying both the React app and Firebase Functions, requiring end-to-end testing to ensure all features work as expected.
